title: Role
content:
Your role represents what you specialize in and what function you serve in your group of Rangers. You choose your role as part of your specialty during character creation and it gives you a card that starts every game in play and grants you a consistent, repeatable ability.

  1. Title: The name of the card.
  2. Card Type: Roles have no traits.
  3. Ability: The ability of that role. These are always exhaust abilities.
  4. Set Information: The name of the card’s set and the card’s number in that set.
